text.text: Rings are the most basic type of metalmind created in the metal forge. They are capable of storing a small amount of power, typically around 5 minutes, and you can wear up to 8 at once. While they do not store a lot of power, they do make it easier to store or tap a lot of power at once for stronger effects.
You can right click a ring with another ring storing the same type of power to quickly transfer it.
